snippet.title: Thank You, Mothers - Barron Trump Sings
snippet.description:
Thank You, Mothers

Check us out on Spotify! https://open.spotify.com/album/3y1CZVxPBVqYl2ljdNVWno?si=lLRWLYbeQcuXD9TQDeKi7A

⬇️⬇️⬇️ Watch more videos below! ⬇️⬇️⬇️
https://youtu.be/WBHJZs8ZeFQ
https://youtu.be/GAdihLnAiXk
https://youtu.be/SZZW8YMZlMg?si=kP7ZE5s5fhhjjpX2
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hq_JjAodbY0

Lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Woke up this morning with a prayer on my lips
Thinking ‘bout all the love a mother gives
From the sleepless nights to the gentle hands
You held the world together with a quiet stand

[Pre-Chorus]
You gave your strength when mine was gone
Taught me right from all the wrong
In every word, in every fight
You loved me through the darkest night

[Chorus]
So thank you, Mama, for all you've done
You're a hero, a heart, the shining sun
And thank You, God, for blessing me this way
For every mom out there, I kneel and pray
On this Mother’s Day

[Verse 2]
I see your light in everything I do
Your faith, your fire, your point of view
And though I stand tall, I’ll always know
It’s on your shoulders I learned to grow

[Pre-Chorus]
Through every storm, you kept me strong
Even when the world felt wrong
Your love—it never fades, it stays
Guiding me through all my days

[Chorus]
So thank you, Mama, for all you've done
You're a hero, a heart, the shining sun
And thank You, God, for blessing me this way
For every mom out there, I kneel and pray
On this Mother’s Day

[Bridge]
From the White House halls to a quiet home
There’s no throne greater than a mother’s own
And no title means more to me
Than being your son eternally

[Final Chorus]
Yeah, thank you, Mama, I’m who I am
Because you loved me just as I began
And thank You, Lord, for hearing me say
Let angels guard the moms today
On this Mother’s Day…

[Outro]
Happy Mother’s Day... from me to you
Thank you, Mama… for all you do


All content, including references to real individuals, is created for entertainment purposes only. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or deceased, is purely coincidental or used in a satirical, transformative, or fictional context. This content is not intended to defame, embellish, misrepresent, or harm the reputation of any individual. No endorsement or affiliation is implied unless explicitly stated.
